refnamediv.refname: Compile and run with javasci v2
refnamediv.refpurpose: How to compile a Java application using Javasci v2

refsection.title: Linux/Unix/MacOSX
refsection.para: On Linux/Unix/MacOSX, Scilab needs the SCI global variable to be set:

listitem.para: In the binary version of Scilab, SCI will point to /path/to/scilab/share/scilab/
In the source tree of Scilab, SCI will point to the root of the source tree /path/to/scilab/source/tree/

refsection.para: To compile a Java application using Javasci v2, the path to the following libraries may have to be added in the classpath:
